posts.post_title: FOR SALE: N172 Old Judge,   N284 Buchner
posts.post_content:
Posted By: fkw
<center>Hi, I have these cards below FOR SALE at reduced prices.

1st email gets card!
Please leave a note here and also email me, thanks. 

(PS. I'll get back to you within 2-3 days as I have limited internet access).

N172 Old Judge Cards

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1887n172baldwin.jpg[/IMG]
Fido Baldwin, Chicago NL (thin left border, small chip on back, nice image contrast) $150

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1887n172brown.jpg[/IMG]
California Brown, NY NL (major damage, back scrapbook, etc.) SOLD

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1887n172darling.jpg[/IMG]
Del Darling, Chicago NL w/ rare angel butterfly back stamp [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG] (back ink, creases, wear) $95

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1887n172deasley.jpg[/IMG]
Tom Deasley, NY NL $165

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1887n172mann.jpg[/IMG]
Fred Mann, St.L AA (corners clipped, back damage from scrapbook, image nice and a desirable sliding pose) SOLD

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1887n172porter.jpg[/IMG]
Henry Porter, Brooklyn AA (major damage, stains, creases, bottom looks slightly trimmed, rare and desirable outdoors pose) $85

N284 Buchner Gold Coin
[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1887n284mccormick.jpg[/IMG]
Jim McCormick, Pittsburgh NL (scarcer cut from ad poster) SOLD

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1887n284meyers.jpg[/IMG]
George Meyers (Myers), Indianapolis NL (small chipping at top, small stain on back) SOLD

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1887n284richardson.jpg[/IMG]
Hardy Richardson, Detroit NL (scarcer cut from ad poster) SOLD

[IMG]http://centuryoldcards.com/images/1887n284ryan.jpg[/IMG]
Jimmy Ryan, Chicago NL (scarcer cut from ad poster) SOLD

All Orders Postage/Insurance Paid

Thanks,  Frank K. Ward (fkw)
</center>
